name: exodus_huge
description: Tempest block — Exodus mega pack: Buyback, Shadow, Licids, Spikes, Oaths/Keepers catch-up.

Creature: Soltari {SUBTYPE} — shadow ({SHADOW_FLAVOR})
Whenever {THIS} enters the battlefield, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, create {X} 1/1 white {TOKEN_SUBTYPE_WHITE} creature tokens.
Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control fewer lands than an opponent.
When {THIS} enters the battlefield, exile target tapped creature an opponent controls until {THIS} leaves the battlefield.
{1}{W}: {THIS} gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
When {THIS} enters, you gain {X} life, where X is the greatest number of creatures a player controls.
Soltari Skirmisher — shadow ({SHADOW_FLAVOR})
Soltari Stalker — shadow. Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.
Soltari Champion — shadow. Soltari Champion gets +1/+0 for each other creature with shadow you control.
Instant: Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn. Buyback — {BUYBACK_COSTS_LOW}.
Prevent the next {X} damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Buyback — {BUYBACK_COSTS_GENERIC}.
Exile target attacking creature with power {X} or less.
Enchantment: Oath of Dawn — At the beginning of your upkeep, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, you gain {X} life.
Creatures you control have vigilance as long as an opponent has more life than you.
LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} Enchanted creature has vigilance and '{1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature this turn.'
Aura — Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets {AURA_BONUS_SMALL}. Buyback — Sacrifice an enchantment.

Oath of Balance — At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has more creatures than you, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each creature you control less than the player with the most.
Oath of Grace — At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has more life than you, you gain {X} life.
Oath of Parity — At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

When {THIS} enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{U}, Sacrifice {THIS}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} Enchanted creature has '{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand.'
When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, scry {X}, then draw a card.
Thalakos Skirmisher — shadow ({SHADOW_FLAVOR})
Thalakos Stalker — shadow. Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.
Thalakos Champion — shadow. Thalakos Champion gets +1/+0 for each other creature with shadow you control.
Instant: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Buyback — {BUYBACK_COSTS_GENERIC}.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Buyback — Discard a card.
Tap up to {X} target permanents. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Buyback — {2}{U}.
Draw two cards, then discard a card. Buyback — Discard a card.
Counter target activated or triggered ability. Buyback — Pay 3 life.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} Enchanted creature has 'You control enchanted creature.' {LICID_ENDING}
Creatures with shadow you control get +1/+0 and can't block.
LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} You control enchanted creature. When you pay {COST2}, it stops being an Aura. {LICID_ENDING}

Creature: Dauthi {SUBTYPE} — shadow ({SHADOW_FLAVOR})
When {THIS} enters the battlefield, each opponent loses {X} life and you gain {X} life.
{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, create a 1/1 black {TOKEN_SUBTYPE_BLACK} creature token.
Dauthi Skirmisher — shadow ({SHADOW_FLAVOR})
Dauthi Stalker — shadow. Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.
Dauthi Champion — shadow. Dauthi Champion gets +1/+0 for each other creature with shadow you control.
Sorcery: Target player discards {X} cards. Buyback — Pay 3 life.
Destroy target creature with mana value {X} or less. Buyback — Discard a card.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose {X} life.
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Buyback — {2}{B}.
Destroy target nonblack creature. Buyback — Pay 3 life.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Buyback — Sacrifice a creature.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. {LICID_ENDING}
Creatures with shadow you control get +2/+0.

Creature: {THIS} has haste.
Whenever {THIS} or another creature enters under your control, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, {THIS} deals 1 damage to any target.
{R}, Sacrifice {THIS}: {THIS} deals 2 damage to any target.
{R}: {THIS} gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Instant: {THIS} deals {X} damage to any target. Buyback — {BUYBACK_COSTS_GENERIC}.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
Destroy target artifact. Buyback — Sacrifice a land.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, create a 1/1 red {TOKEN_SUBTYPE_RED} creature token with haste. Sacrifice it at end of turn.
Creatures with shadow can't block.
LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} Enchanted creature has menace and '{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.'
Sorcery: {THIS} deals 3 damage to any target. Buyback — {3}{R}.
Destroy target land. Buyback — Sacrifice a land.
Creatures without shadow can't block this turn. Buyback — Discard a card.

Creature: Spike {SUBTYPE} — {THIS} enters the battlefield with {X} +1/+1 counters on it.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from {THIS}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Trample
Spike Worker — {{THIS}} enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from {THIS} onto target creature.
Spike Drone — {{THIS}} enters with three +1/+1 counters on it. {G}: Remove a +1/+1 counter from {THIS}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
Spike Feeder — {{THIS}} enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from {THIS}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Sorcery: Put {X} +1/+1 counters on target creature. Buyback — {BUYBACK_COSTS_GENERIC}.
Search your library for up to {X} basic land cards, reveal them, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Buyback — Discard a card.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Creatures you control with counters on them have trample.
LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. {LICID_ENDING}

Artifact: LICID — {LICID_ACTIVATE} Enchanted creature has '{1}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.' {LICID_ENDING}
Whenever you cast a spell, if {BEHIND_CHECKS}, draw a card, then discard a card.

Land: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {THIS} doesn't untap during your next untap step.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your upkeep,
Whenever a creature you control dies,
At the beginning of combat on your turn,
BEHIND_CHECKS: if an opponent controls more creatures than you
if an opponent has more cards in hand than you
if an opponent has more life than you
if an opponent controls more lands than you
LICID_ACTIVATE: {COST}: {THIS} loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {COST2} to end this effect.
SHADOW_FLAVOR: Creatures with shadow can block or be blocked only by creatures with shadow.
